#text=My friend and I set aside a date that we could meet each other .
#text=She lives in another area so I had to buy a train ticket .
#text=Since we planned the trip early , I was able to save a little bit of money .
#text=The trip would n't be for another two weeks .
#text=Once the day finally came , I took a cab to the train station .
#text=Once , inside the station , I checked the displays for any signs of my train being late .
#text=About fifteen minutes later , my train showed up and I got on board .
#text=It was crowded but not as much as one of the local trains .
#text=I made sure to listen for any announcements about what stops we were arriving at so I 'd know when I was close to my destination .
#text=Finally , the train arrived at my destination and I met my friend just outside the station .
